Mousetail Documentation
=======================

.. image:: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/listfold/mousetail/main/mousetail_transparent.png
   :alt: Mousetail Logo
   :width: 200px
   :align: center

Mousetail is a standalone MCP (Model Context Protocol) server that enables LLMs to interact with Anki flashcard collections using Anki's Python library.

Quick Start
-----------

Run the server with:

.. code-block:: bash

   uvx mousetail

For detailed installation and configuration instructions, see the :doc:`usage` guide.
